result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerome Davonte Norman

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jerome Davonte Norman not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pretrial conference.  Defendant does not appear.  Court issued a bench warrant and forfeited $500.00 PR Bond.


CASE RECALLED LATER THE SAME MORNING:
Defendant appeared late.  Court vacated bench warrant and reinstated the bail.
Defendant does not qualify for State Public Defender representation and needs to hire a private attorney. 
Case is adjourned to 11-7-22 at 1;30 pm for status of counsel.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with E.M.W-W.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jerome Davonte Norman appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Theodore OReilly appeared by video for Jerome Davonte Norman. Attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case is being retabbed due to DV judge of the week. Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Havas in Br 10. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY. 
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
